meanings.sent1: The crenulation of the clay created a unique pattern.
meanings.sent2: The crenulation along the wall added a decorative touch to the room.
meanings.sent3: The crenulation of the cake's frosting made it look like a mini mountain range.
meanings.sent4: The crenulation of the waves against the shore was mesmerizing to watch.
meanings.sent5: The crenulation of the tree branches created interesting shadows on the ground.

meanings.definition: A series of small, rounded projections along an edge.
meanings.sent1: The crenulation on the seashell gave it a textured feel.
meanings.sent2: The crenulation of the roof tiles helped with water drainage.
meanings.sent3: The crenulation on the toy car's wheels made it look like a futuristic vehicle.
meanings.sent4: The crenulation of the mountain range in the distance looked like a row of sleeping giants.
meanings.sent5: The crenulation of the fabric's hem added a delicate touch to the dress.
